column2: "Na aber no mu Jesus koduaa eburow kwa mu ahomgyeda; na ɔkɔm dzee n’esuafo no
column3: wɔhyɛɛ ase pempaan eburow mbɛtsem no wee."

column2: "Na Farisiifo no hunii no
column3: wɔsee no dɛ
column4: Hwɛ
column5: w’esuafo no reyɛ dza ɔmmfa mbra mu ahomgyeda."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Ana hom nnkenkaan dza David yɛe aber a ɔkɔm dzee ɔno nye hɔn a wɔka no ho no?"

column2: "Mbrɛ ɔkɛhɛɛn Nyankopɔn fie na okedzii kyerɛpaanoo a ɔmmfa mbra mu dɛ odzi
column3: anaa hɔn a wɔka no ho no
column4: gyedɛ asɔfo no ara nko no?"

column2: "Anaaso hom nnkenkanee wɔ mbra no mu
column3: mbrɛ ahomgyeda no mu asɔfo no wɔto ahomgyeda wɔ asɔrfi no mu
column4: na wonndzi fɔ?"

column2: "Na mese hom dɛ nyia ɔkyɛn asɔrfi no wɔ ha."
"Na sɛ hom tsee kasa yi ase a
column3: dɛ
column4: Mepɛ ehumbɔbɔr na nnyɛ afɔrbɔ a
column5: nkyɛ hom emmbu hɔn a wonndzi fɔ no fɔ."

column2: "Na nyimpa Ba no yɛ ahomgyeda no so no wura."
"Na ofii hɔ kɔree
column3: na ɔkɔr hɔn nhyiamudan no mu;"

column2: "na hwɛ
column3: nyimpa bi wɔ hɔ a ne nsa adwe. Na wobisaa no see dɛ
column4: Ana ɔfa mbra mu dɛ wɔsa yarba ahomgyeda? Ama woeetum aatoa no."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom mu nyimpa bɛn
column4: na sɛ ɔwɔ oguan kor
column5: na sɛ ɔkɔtɔ mona mu ahomgyeda a
column6: onnkosuo no mu na ɔama no do?"

column2: "Ebɛnadze a? Ana nyimpa nsom bo nkyɛn oguan a? Dɛm ntsi ɔfa mbra mu dɛ wɔyɛ papa ahomgyeda."
"Nna ɔsee nyimpa no dɛ
column3: Tsen wo nsa.  Na ɔtsenee; na ɔsanee yɛɛ mu dɛ kor no."

column2: "Na Farisiifo no puei
column3: na wɔkɛfaa apam wɔ no ho
column4: mbrɛ wɔbɛyɛ asɛɛ no."

column2: "Na Jesus hunii no
column3: ɔtwee noho fii hɔ
column4: na dodowara kaa no do
column7: "na ɔbraa hɔn dɛ mma wonnyi no nnkyerɛ:"

column2: "ma dza nkɔnhyɛnyi Isaia kae no aaba mu dɛ
column4: "Hwɛ
column6: Mo dɔfo a me kra enyiwa sɔ no: Medze mo Sunsum bogu no do

column2: "Ɔnnkɛper
column3: eso ɔnnkɛtsea mu; Eso obiara nnkɛtse ne ndze wɔ abɔntsen do."

column2: "Ndzɛmbir a ɔakonkon no onnkobu
column3: Na asaaba a opun wusiw onnkodum no
column4: Dze ekesi dɛ ɔbɛma atsɛmbu akɔ konyim mu."

column2: "Na ne dzin mu na amanaman dze hɔn werɛ bɛhyɛ."
"Nna wɔdze obi a abɔnsam afa no a ɔyɛ onyifurafo nye mmum brɛɛ no: na ɔsaa no yarba
column3: na mmum no kasae na ohun adze."

column2: "Na nyimpadodow no nyina ho boow hɔn
column3: na wɔsee dɛ
column4: Ana oyi nye David ba no?"

column2: "Na Farisiifo no tsee no
column3: wɔsee dɛ
column4: Oyi nntum nntu mbɔnsam gyedɛ ɔnam mbɔnsam panyin Beelzebul do."

column2: "Na ohun hɔn adwen no
column3: ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Ahenman biara nye noho dzi mpaapaamu a
column6: na kurow anaa fi biara a ɔnye noho dzi mpaapaamu no orinngyina:"

column2: "na sɛ Satan tu Satan a
column3: nna ɔnye noho edzi mpaapaamu: ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na n’ahenman egyina?"

column2: "Na sɛ emi menam Beelzebul do tu mbɔnsam a
column3: woana do na hom mba nam tu hɔn? Dɛm ntsi hɔn na wɔbɛyɛ hom atsɛmbuafo."

column2: "Na sɛ menam Nyankopɔn Sunsum do tu mbɔnsam a
column3: nna Nyankopɔn ahenman enya aba hom nkyɛn."

column2: "Anaadɛ
column3: ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na obi botum akɔ ɔkatakyi bi ne fie akɔfow n’efidze
column4: gyedɛ odzi kan kyekyer ɔkatakyi no

column2: "Nyia ɔnnka mo ho no
column3: na ɔnye me enya; nyia ɔnye me mmboaboa ano no
column4: ɔhotse gu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mese hom dɛ
column3: Bɔn biara
column4: ɔnye ebususɛm biara
column6: na ebususɛm a otsia Sunsum no dze

column2: "Na obiara a ɔbɛka asɛm etsia nyimpa Ba no
column3: wɔdze bɛkyɛ no
column4: na obiara a ɔbɛka asɛm etsia Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no
column5: wɔnnkɛfa akyɛ no wɔ wiadze ha
column6: nye wiadze a ɔreba no mu."

column2: "Hom mma dua no nyɛ yie
column3: na n’aba so nyɛ yie; anaadɛ hom mma dua no mprɔw
column4: na n’aba so mprɔw: osiandɛ dua wɔdze n’aba hu no."

column2: "Nhurutsia mba
column3: ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na hom muo yi
column4: hom bɛka nsɛm pa? Na dza ebu do wɔ akoma mu no na ano ka."

column2: "Nyimpa pa fi ne ndzepa korabea na oyi ndzepa fi ba; na nyimpa bɔn fi ne ndzɛmba bɔn korabea na oyi dza omuo fi ba."
"Na mese hom dɛ nsɛngyan biara a nyimpa bɛka no wobobu ho nkontaa wɔ atsɛmbu da mu."
"Osiandɛ wo nsɛm do na wɔnam bobu wo bem; na wo nsɛm do na wɔnam bobu wo fɔ."
"Nna Akyerɛwfo no nye Farisiifo no mu binom buae see dɛ
column3: Kyerɛkyerɛfo
column4: yɛpɛ dɛ yehu wo hɔ asɛnkyerɛdze."

column2: "Na obuae see hɔn dɛ
column3: Ɔsantsen bɔn nye awartofo rohwehwɛ asɛnkyerɛdze
column4: na wɔremma hɔn asɛnkyerɛdze biara dɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi Jona asɛnkyerɛdze no:"

column2: "na dɛ mbrɛ Jona dzii ndaansa adzekyee nye adzesaa wɔ bonso yamu no
column3: dɛmara na nyimpa Ba no bedzi ndaansa adzekyee nye adzesaa wɔ asaase tsirmu."

column2: "Ninive mbarimba nye ɔsantsen yi bɔsoɛr wɔ atsɛmbu no mu
column3: na woebu hɔn fɔ; osiandɛ wonuu hɔnho wɔ Jona n’asɛnka ase
column4: na hwɛ

column2: "Pomu afamu ɔhembaa nye ɔsantsen yi bɔsoɛr wɔ atsɛmbu no mu
column3: na oebu hɔn fɔ: osiandɛ ofii asaase ano noho bae betsiee Solomon ne nyansaa
column4: na hwɛ

column2: "Na sunsum fi
column3: sɛ ofi nyimpa mu fir a
column4: okekyin wewew do hwehwɛ ahomgye na onnya bi."

column2: "Nna ɔse dɛ
column3: Mebɛsan akɔ me fie a mifii mu bae no mu
column4: na ɔba a

column2: "Nna ɔkɔ kɛfa esunsum esuon fofor a womuo sen nankasa ka no ho
column3: na wɔbɛhɛn mu tsena hɔ: na nyimpa no n’ekyir asetsena yɛ bɔn sen nkan no dze; dɛmara na ɔbɛyɛ ama ɔsantsen bɔn yi."

column2: "Na ɔda do rekasa kyerɛ nyimpadodow no
column3: hwɛ
column4: ne na nye no nuanom begyinaa abow enyim hwehwɛɛ dɛ wɔnye no kasa."

column2: "Na obi see no dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: wo na ɔnye wo nuanom gyina abow enyim rohwehwɛ nye wo akasa."

column2: "Na obuae see nyia ɔkaa kyerɛɛ no no dɛ
column3: Woana nye me na
column4: na woananom nye mo nuanom?"

column2: "Na ɔtseen ne nsa wɔ n’esuafo no do see dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: me na nye mo nuanom."

column2: "Na obiara a ɔbɛyɛ m’Egya a ɔwɔ sor no ne pɛ no
column3: ɔno nye mo nua
column4: nye m’akyerɛbaa
